text: @NikkiHaley @standamericanow Do you have the courage to stand up to Trump whose has been fact checked telling over 20,000 lies to the American people and tell him? Do you have the courage to tell Trump that his misinformation with the Coronavirus has killed over 130,000 Americans? I don't think you can!
